author: Joe Calderone, a former editor at The Daily News, teaches journalism at New York University.
body: As a resident of Nassau County, which just raised property taxes by nearly 20 percent to avoid bankruptcy, I strongly identify with New York City's fiscal woes. Mayor Michael R. title: I'll Pay to Play
